titleStmt.title: Gilgame&c;, Enkidu and the nether world -- a composite transliteration

publicationStmt.distributor: The Electronic Text Corpus of Sumerian Literature

address.addrLine: The Oriental Institute, University of Oxford, Pusey Lane, Oxford OX1 2LE, UK, email etcsl@orinst.ox.ac.uk, http://etcsl.orinst.ox.ac.uk

seriesStmt.p: The Electronic Text Corpus of Sumerian Literature aims to make accessible over 400 literary works composed in the Sumerian language in ancient Mesopotamia during the late third and early second millennia BC. The works are in Sumerian composite transliteration and English prose translation with bibliographical information on each composition.

bibl.biblScope: score transliteration, translation, photograph, handcopy, commentary

bibl.note: adds to the list of mss. in Shaffer 1963

bibl.biblScope: CBS 14068 (SEM 21; photo Kramer SM pl. 8; FTS fg. 38)
CBS 15150 + CBS 19950 (both photo FTS fg. 69) + UM 29-13-438 + N 3280 + N 3474 + N 3634 (all except N 3280 pl. 5f.)
HS 1482 (TMH NF 3 14) + HS 2502 + HS 2612 + HS w/n (WK 21)
N 2696 + N 3162 + UM 29-16-463 (last two Shaffer pl. 10)

body.head: Version A, from Nibru, Urim, and elsewhere

l.note: Cited in OB catalogue from Nibru, at Philadelphia, 0.2.01, line 7, line 20, line 21; OB catalogue in the Louvre, 0.2.02, line 7, line 14, line 15; OB catalogue from Urim (U2), 0.2.04, line 29; OB catalogue from Nibru (N3), 0.2.06, line 6
